item.title: Chrome will let you switch between personal and work accounts on iOS
item.description: Google is introducing the option to easily switch between personal and work profiles in its Chrome browser on iOS, with data kept separate between the two. The new option is part of Google’s enterpris

item.title: Our biggest questions about ChromeOS and Android merging
item.description: Sameer Samat, Google’s head of Android ecosystems, recently confirmed that Android and ChromeOS will be merged into a single platform, reigniting a slew of questions about the future of the operating
